H0.text: Which Wagner opera tells the story of the eponymous swan knight and features The Bridal Chorus. Parsifal

H1.text: Which Wagner opera tells the story of the eponymous swan knight and features The Bridal Chorus. Tannhäuser

H2.text: Which Wagner opera tells the story of the eponymous swan knight and features The Bridal Chorus. Die Meistersinger von Nürnberg

H3.text: Which Wagner opera tells the story of the eponymous swan knight and features The Bridal Chorus. Lorengel

A4.text: Richard Wagner's opera Lohengrin of 1848 is based upon the legend.

A5.text: The most famous piece from Lohengrin is the 'Bridal Chorus' ('Here Comes the Bride'), still played at many Western weddings.
